actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the wages of Federal employees be subject to court-ordered deductions for child support.

summary.text: Provides that the wages of Federal employees shall be subject to court-ordered deductions for child support. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 5520)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the wages of Federal employees be subject to court-ordered deductions for child support.
